title: Play It Out
description:
Pablo Torre, Elle Duncan and Spencer Hall debate how they see the NFL’s investigation into Stephen Ross and the tanking allegations playing out before talking how confident Michigan should be about Jim Harbaugh moving forward.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): How Will Tanking Allegations Play Out In The NFL?
